医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
生活的艰辛重塑大脑：研究指出逆境带来的神经变化研究表明，不良的生活经历会增强杏仁核的反应并减少前额皮质的活动，这表明心理脆弱性的潜在神经机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231105/Lifes-hardships-rewire-the-brain-Study-pinpoints-neural-changes-from-adversity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231105/Lifes-hardships-rewire-the-brain-Study-pinpoints-neural-changes-from-adversity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d67429c1-a73d-4051-a43d-7293a0ca0689 Sun, 05 Nov 2023 20:20:00 -0500 Life's hardships rewire the brain: Study pinpoints neural changes from adversity
胆结石疾病的基因扭曲可能有助于预防心脏病孟德尔随机化表明胆结石疾病可能降低心脏病发作的风险；遗传学在这种保护作用中发挥着关键作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231105/Genetic-twist-in-gallstone-disease-may-shield-against-heart-attacks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231105/Genetic-twist-in-gallstone-disease-may-shield-against-heart-attacks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f6fff865-2f05-4ef7-8c6b-a324ad23f8a5 Sun, 05 Nov 2023 20:10:00 -0500 Genetic twist in gallstone disease may shield against heart attacks
癌症隐藏规则图谱：揭开 11 种肿瘤的转录组和表观遗传秘密研究人员绘制了癌症复杂的表观遗传和转录组图谱，揭示了 11 种肿瘤类型的关键调控元件，这些元件可以为癌症进展和转移提供新的见解。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231105/Atlas-of-cancers-hidden-rules-Unveiling-the-transcriptomic-and-epigenic-secrets-across-11-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231105/Atlas-of-cancers-hidden-rules-Unveiling-the-transcriptomic-and-epigenic-secrets-across-11-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0f961eba-f02f-4854-b3d8-1eb32e63561e Sun, 05 Nov 2023 20:04:00 -0500 Atlas of cancer's hidden rules: Unveiling the transcriptomic and epigenetic secrets across 11 tumors
游轮客舱研究揭示了遏制病毒传播的最佳气流研究表明，适当的通风率可以限制病毒在游轮舱内的传播，中等气流可以优化飞沫遏制和空气更新。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231105/Cruise-ship-cabin-study-reveals-optimal-airflow-to-curb-virus-spread.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231105/Cruise-ship-cabin-study-reveals-optimal-airflow-to-curb-virus-spread.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=35b99c32-4609-4581-a666-709ae06ac14b Sun, 05 Nov 2023 19:55:00 -0500 Cruise ship cabin study reveals optimal airflow to curb virus spread
解读长期新冠肺炎、病理生理学、流行病学、诊断和管理全面审查揭示了长期新冠肺炎从病理生理学到管理策略的复杂性，并强调了靶向治疗和早期诊断的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231105/Decoding-long-COVID-pathophysiology-epidemiology-diagnosis-and-management.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231105/Decoding-long-COVID-pathophysiology-epidemiology-diagnosis-and-management.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=eb07558d-486e-4731-8a14-18d388c27a86 Sun, 05 Nov 2023 19:47:00 -0500 Decoding long COVID, pathophysiology, epidemiology, diagnosis, and management
咖啡因如何影响脑血流量咖啡因的摄入会影响年轻人的脑血流量，研究表明摄入后动脉血流速度会出现剂量依赖性的降低。这种对心血管系统的影响表明咖啡因对脑动脉具有舒张血管的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231105/How-caffeine-impacts-cerebral-blood-flow.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231105/How-caffeine-impacts-cerebral-blood-flow.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e7ee0930-a4b0-4844-a117-c63779d28898 Sun, 05 Nov 2023 19:37:00 -0500 How caffeine impacts cerebral blood flow
使用瑞普替尼和手术治疗复发性胃肠道间质瘤2023 年 9 月 20 日，《Oncoscience》（第 10 卷）发表了一篇新病例报告，题为“使用开关控制激酶抑制剂瑞普替尼和手术对携带 KIT 外显子 11 突变的复发性胃肠道间质瘤进行多学科治疗”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/Using-ripretinib-and-surgery-to-manage-recurrent-胃肠道-间质-肿瘤.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/Using-ripretinib-and-surgery-to-manage-recurrent-胃肠道间质肿瘤.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a00fc7a4-c005-49a4-b5e3-c337149ef7b1 Fri, 03 Nov 2023 16:42:00 -0500 Using ripretinib and surgery to manage recurrent gastrointestinal stromal tumor
发现对抗心血管疾病的新途径明尼苏达大学医学院领导的研究确定了对抗心血管疾病的新途径。该研究最近发表在《自然心血管研究》上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/New-pathway-to-combat-cardioangio-disease-identified.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/New-pathway-to-combat-cardioangio-disease-identified.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0c162e85-7d7f-4f32-994a-873da4b4c42e Fri, 03 Nov 2023 16:30:00 -0500 New pathway to combat cardiovascular disease identified
研究发现英国在获得精神病早期心理干预方面存在种族差异伦敦大学学院研究人员领导的一项新研究发现，在英国，如果首次经历精神病发作的人来自少数民族背景，那么他们接受早期心理干预的可能性较小。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/Study-finds-ethnic-disparities-in-access-to-early-psychological-interventions-for-psychosis-in-England.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/Study-finds-ethnic-disparities-in-access-to-early-psychological-interventions-for-psychosis-in-England.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b8dcc64-b2cb-41c3-b1bf-21a032da0fd1 Fri, 03 Nov 2023 14:58:00 -0500 Study finds ethnic disparities in access to early psychological interventions for psychosis in England
吸烟会导致有害的 DNA 突变，从而破坏抗癌保障措施安大略省癌症研究所 (OICR) 的科学家发现了吸烟导致癌症的一种方式，并通过破坏人体的抗癌保障措施使癌症变得更难治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/Tobacco-smoking-undermines-anti-cancer-safeguards-by-causing-harmful-DNA-mutations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231103/Tobacco-smoking-undermines-anti-cancer-safeguards-by-causing-harmful-DNA-mutations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b5e44834-3d6b-4bd0-9ec6-e7133f3caa98 Fri, 03 Nov 2023 14:52:00 -0500 Tobacco smoking undermines anti-cancer safeguards by causing harmful DNA mutations
